WRITING.TEXT: I will sometimes do this if I'm alone in a room and have enemies nearby on the minimap. I'll shoot a wall to attract them to my location then I will hide and shoot them. Works a treat to attract defenders away from the cargo before running for my life to grab it.

WRITING.TITLE: Green Day vs. Linkin Park - Rocktober Rumble, Semifinals....GET VOTING! ;)
TMDQA! Great interview with Mike Dirnt! Intro isn't English, but rest of interview is! (October 21st)
Would I get lost reading DISCWORLD in publication order?
WRITING.TEXT:
I have seen all the suggested reading orders but I was wondering if there were any benefits/consequences of reading them in publication order? (Almost finished my first Discworld book, The Colour of Magic, so happy I took the time to!)
UPDATE - Thanks for the comments!! I'll read them all in publication order! :)
UPDATE 2 - I've just finished The Colour of Magic! The ending certainly took me by surprise! I knew where Rincewind ended up as I read the blurb of The Light Fantastic when I purchased it, but the way he got there was very cool! I'm really looking forward to this series!!
Thanks for the highly intelligent review.
